DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effectiveness Ultrasound Paraffin Therapy Patients With Carpal Tunnel Syndrome : A Randomized Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose exploratory study compare combination wrist orthosis either ultrasound therapy paraffin bath therapy treatment carpal tunnel syndrome patient . We hypothesize ultrasound therapy might effective paraffin therapy provide thermal nonthermal effect .
DOC.criteria: patient subjective symptom ( pain and/or numbness median nerve distribution digits nocturnal pain ) . Furthermore , patient require either positive Phalen 's sign positive Tinel 's sign along electrophysiological evidence carpal tunnel syndrome . ( 1 ) age young 18 year old ; ( 2 ) underlie medical disorder , diabetes mellitus , renal failure , autoimmune disease hypothyroidism ; ( 3 ) pregnancy , previous wrist trauma surgery .
